title: DatasetDefsCommon
description: All dataset definitions must have a kind, network and name. The name must match the filename. Schema is optional for TOML dataset format.

kind.description: Dataset kind. See specific dataset definitions for supported values.

schema.description: Dataset schema. Lists the tables defined by this dataset.

SerializableSchema.description: A serializable representation of a collection of [`arrow::datatypes::Schema`]s, without any metadata.
